issue.title: No specification of default ctor for reverse_iterator

discussion.p: The declaration of reverse_iterator lists a default constructor. However, no specification is given what this constructor should do.

resolution.p: In section add the following paragraph:

blockquote.p: Default initializes current. Iterator operations applied to the resulting iterator have defined behavior if and only if the corresponding operations are defined on a default constructed iterator of type Iterator.

resolution.note: pre-Copenhagen: Dietmar provide wording for proposed resolution.
